column2: select &&&+c.table_name as table_name, c.column_name,ci.datatype,ci.encoding_id ,c.ordinal_position   from information_schema.columns c         inner join metadata.columninfo ci     on ci.table_name=c.table_name      and c.column_name = ci.column_name+&&&+cast(ci.id as varchar(#)     order by #, c.ordinal_position
